```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(tidyverse)
```
ggplot(trump_approval_ratings, aes(x=modeldate)) + geom_point(aes(y=dem),color="blue",alpha=0.9)+geom_smooth(method = "loess",aes(x = modeldate, y = dem)) + geom_point(aes(y=rep),color="red",alpha=0.5)+geom_smooth(method = "loess", aes(x = modeldate, y = rep))
```
